row.entry: This module can be used to modify the global saturation or to give a tint.

sect5.title: color board
sect5.para: You can drag a white dot and a dark dot independently to give global tint to highlights and shadows. Set dots to the same color for a homogeneous global tint or to different colors for split toning.

sect5.title: saturation
sect5.para: Use the saturation slider to correct the global saturation.
